# llms.txt for agnij.dev

# About
Agnij Dutta is a full-stack developer and blockchain engineer from Kolkata, India. Currently studying Data Science at IIT Madras. Building human-centered software at Workwise and HackQuest.

# Contact

# Skills
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript
- Backend: Node.js, Express, REST APIs
- Blockchain: Solidity, Smart Contracts, Web3, Ethereum
- Data Science: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Machine Learning
- Tools: Git, Docker, AWS

# Experience
- SDE Intern at Workwise (2025-present)
- Developer Advocate at HackQuest (2024-present)

# Education
